backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, cart, orders, user profiles, blob storage, and admin‑restricted updates with authentication checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining design tokens, light/dark variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting up the app container and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and theme setup defining all routes, including protected admin pages and global providers.
frontend/src/components/about/CeoPhotoUp: Provides an admin-only file upload field for updating the CEO photo with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Shows a searchable product table with edit and delete actions, including confirmation before deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/ImageUploa: Handles product image selection, preview, and upload progress, allowing removal or replacement.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoUpload: Enables admins to preview and upload a new site logo with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Form for creating or editing a product, including fields, image upload, and submit logic for backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper adding header, footer, and animated main content region.
frontend/src/components/Auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with different text for authenticated and unauthenticated users and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout, shows user name, and manages login status UI.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save a profile.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProtectedAd: Route guard that checks identity and admin role, showing a loading spinner or access-denied screen when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/cart/AddToCartBu: Renders an add-to-cart UI with quantity selection, authentication checks, stock validation, and mutation triggers.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartLineIte: Displays a cart item with product info, quantity editing, removal controls, and live mutation updates.
frontend/src/components/products/Categor: Provides a tab-based category selector that updates the selected category.
Shows a static icon strip image representing product categories.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays product details in a card with image, metadata, price, and navigation to the product page.
Renders a product image or a fallback icon if no image is available.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders a footer with company info, navigation links, and a dynamic copyright line including a caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Displays the main site header with logo, navigation, authentication controls, cart badge, and a mobile menu; adapts links based on user role.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on authentication, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides create, update, and delete product mutations with backend actor and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Implements cart queries and mutations including retrieval, add, update, remove, clear, and total calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCeoPhoto.ts: Fetches and updates the CEO photo blob from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves the authenticated user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserRole.ts: Fetches the current user's role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, identity retrieval, and context exposure for authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogo.ts: Fetches and updates the site's logo blob with backend actor integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides React Query hooks to place orders and fetch order data with error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Defines hooks to fetch all products or a single product and includes a helper to extract sorted categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains a mutation hook to save the caller's user profile and invalidate related cache.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode, animations, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with CEO info, company values, and admin-only photo upload controls.
frontend/src/pages/AdminOrdersPage.tsx: Displays all customer orders with loading states and detailed order item lists for admins.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing products, uploading the logo, and creating or editing products.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows the user’s cart with product details, totals, and navigation to checkout.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays all products with category filtering, using loading states and animated product cards.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow, showing cart items, calculating totals, placing orders, and showing order confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation links to catalog and about pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed product information with image, specs, stock status, and add-to-cart functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and included plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, architectural notes, known issues, and a list of existing features for the FS Enterprises marketing website/app. Highlights admin restrictions, asset management rules, and a checkout bug needing fixes.
